landmark__battledia.title: Battledia
landmark__battledia.desctiption: Battledia Quests are unique quests that can be accessed through a Trigger Portal

landmark__cocoon.title: Cocoon
landmark__cocoon.desctiption: Cocoons are smaller challenges designed to test players

landmark__ryuker.title: Ryuker Device
landmark__ryuker.desctiption: Ryuker Devices can be used for several purposes, including changing Blocks, accessing your Storage remotely, creating Quick Food, moving to different Rooms, and quick travel

landmark__tower.title: Tower
landmark__tower.desctiption: Towers are larger challenges, more complex quests similar to "Time Attack" quests from PSO2

landmark__urgent.title: Emergency Quest
landmark__urgent.desctiption: Urgent Quests are special Quests that can occur several times a day and can only be accepted during the time period it occurs

mineral__dualomite.title: Dualomite
mineral__dualomite.desctiption: Used for unlocking Potentials Lv2 and Limit Breaking at the Item Lab

mineral__monotite.title: Monotite
mineral__monotite.desctiption: Used for unlocking Potentials Lv1 and Limit Breaking at the Item Lab

mineral__photonChunk.title: Photon Chunk
mineral__photonChunk.desctiption: Used for Limit Breaking at the Item Lab

mineral__photonQuartz.title: Photon Quartz
mineral__photonQuartz.desctiption: Used for Multi-weaponization at the Item Lab

mineral__trinite.title: Trinite
mineral__trinite.desctiption: Used for unlocking Potentials Lv3 and Limit Breaking at the Item Lab

food__aelio_crab.title: Sharp Aelio Crab
food__aelio_crab.desctiption: Increases HP / Increases weak point damage

food__aelio_pear.title: Sharp Aelio Pear
food__aelio_pear.desctiption: Increases PP / Increases weak point damage

food__aelio_tomato.title: Sharp Aelio Tomato
food__aelio_tomato.desctiption: Damage Resistance / Increases weak point damage

food__retem_carambola.title: Sharp Retem Star Fruit
food__retem_carambola.desctiption: Increases PP / Increases weak point damage

food__retem_mushroom.title: Sharp Retem Mushroom
food__retem_mushroom.desctiption: Damage Resistance / Increases weak point damage

food__retem_urchin.title: Sharp Retem Sea Urchin
food__retem_urchin.desctiption: Increases HP / Increases weak point damage

container__gold.title: Item Container [Gold]
container__gold.desctiption: Contains valuable items like minerals or Alpha Reactors

container__red.title: Item Container [Red]
container__red.desctiption: Contains very valuable items like Meseta, Star Gems, Units, etc.. Each container can only be broken once per account.

other__alphaReactor.title: Alpha Reactor
other__alphaReactor.desctiption:
Can be converted to 3500 N-Meseta. 
14 Alpha Reactors will spawn in various locations in the Aelio Region every day.

other__datapod.title: Datapod
other__datapod.desctiption: Message Packs contain messages from the residents of Halpha. Some also contain items.

other__stellarSeed.title: Stellar Seed
other__stellarSeed.desctiption:
Can be converted to 2000 N-Meseta. 
10 Stellar Fragments will spawn in West Retem every day.

other__veteran.title: Veteran
other__veteran.desctiption: "Battle-Hardened" enemies that spawn at fixed locations in Exploration Sections. Also known as "Dread" enemies or "Veterans".

other__stellarGrace.title: Stellar Grace
other__stellarGrace.desctiption: Stellar Graces are part of the "Stellar Grace Recovery Operation" World Trial. The objective of the World Trial is to gather all the pyramidal containers known as Stellar Graces hidden in each Exploration Section.

other__musicPlace.title: BGM Easter Egg
other__musicPlace.desctiption: Places that play music from older games of the Phantasy Star franchise.
